DOC.brief_summary: This study tests preschoolers, school children, youths and young adults, who were born preterm or full-term, in their theory of mind abilities.
DOC.brief_title: Theory of Mind in Preschool Children, School Children, Youths and Adults Born Preterm or Full-term
DOC.detailed_description: Is there any difference in the development of theory of mind between preterms and full-terms? Is there a risk group of preterms to develop a deficit in theroy of mind? Four groups are tested: prescoolers (again two years later), youths and young adults. All participants were tested for theory of mind, executive functions, language and cognitive abilites.
DOC.criteria: informed consent preterm: birthweight <1500g fullterm: born after 38 weeks no informed consent
